edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player

Class NetworkPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player.Player
      • edu.mccc.cos210.fp2014.cm.player.NetworkPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class NetworkPlayer
extends Player
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A networked player, only one of these is created during networked games. Handles sockets, marshalling, and other networked transmission of the current game state.
